'''Cluster of Riches''' is a [[Component]] that can be used in the creation of Custom Domains during the [[Divine Ingenuity/2023-06-08|Divine Ingenuity: Collector's Chapter]] event.

Item Small Earth Spikes.png|Small Earth Spikes × 2
</gallery>
